participant_1.name: Maya Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, Maya is passionate about music and eager to learn new skills in gardening.
participant_1.background: I want to find a place to live that is perfect for my hobbies and interests. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job. I have a black thumb when it comes to growing plants, but I'm determined to learn more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden. I'm a vegan. I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.

participant_2.name: Liam Rodriguez
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and independent, Liam enjoys the thrill of racing and has a creative side with drawing and gardening.
participant_2.background: I check my nails to see if they are still looking good. I can draw. My favorite food is pasta. I race cars for a living. I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Not bad, just got done with work. How about you?
I'm doing alright. I have a few things to do today but I'm excited to get started.
What do you have to do?
I'm going to try to learn more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden.
Oh, that sounds cool! I have a black thumb when it comes to plants.
Me too, that's why I want to learn more about it!
I'm sure you'll do great! What's your favorite type of plant?
I like flowers, especially roses and sunflowers.
Roses are my favorite too! Sunflowers are pretty, but I'm not a fan of the pollen.
I get that. I love the way they look, but I don't like the way they smell.
Haha, yeah they can be a little strong.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a race car driver.
Oh, wow! That's so cool!
Yeah, it's a lot of fun.
I bet it is! I can't imagine how fast those cars go.
They're pretty fast! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the adrenaline rush.
That sounds amazing! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to try that.
It's not for everyone, but it's a lot of fun.
I bet it is!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play music and spend time with my friends and family.
Oh, that sounds fun! I like to draw and paint.
Oh, that's cool! I can draw a little bit, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, everyone has to start somewhere!
Yeah, I guess you're right.
So, what kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
Oh, that's cool! I like a little bit of everything, but I'm not really into rock and roll.
That's okay! There's something for everyone.
